website_summaries.verdict: Extremely low price for a camera suction mount that ships with five different adapters for versatility.
pros: With five different mounting hardware clamps, you can use this unit with many different models of dash cams
Allows for a 360-degree rotation of the attached camera
Should give you a sturdy attachment in all temperatures
cons: Made primarily to work with dashboard cameras, rather than action cameras

customer_reviews.title: Well build!
customer_reviews.text: Wow finally I have found a perfect one to mount my 360 dash cam. Short and very sturdy and not sure about durability, as of not yet to tell just have to wait and see. But so far look really good and well build, the base small not big like the other mount and short, not blocking your view while driving. I'm highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: AMAZON SHOPPER

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: It came with all the attachments that I needed. Good product and good customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Impressive for the price point!
customer_reviews.text: For $8.99, I wasn't expecting to be blown away by this mount, but guess what? I was. The package came with several types of adapters that will suit your particular needs and although the plastic is very much plas-tic-yyyyy, it is holding my dash cam up just fine and the suction cup went up and stuck the first time. It's been 3 days since I installed it on my windshield and with the "heatwave" we've been experiencing in California combined with the cold rush of air conditioning, there's been no negative impact on the suction mount. I am completely satisfied with this product and for $8.99, you don't have very much to lose if you don't believe me.
customer_reviews.author: Rene2.0

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy no wobble mount
customer_reviews.text: My dash cam came with a flimsy mount that would shake with every little bump, after trying to tighten it numerous times the nut stripped. This mount came with the adapter I needed, and is a lot beefier than the old one, no more shakes. The suction cup on the other hand is just the clear stiff plastic found on low quality items. It took me a few times to get it stuck, but I did, and it hasn't fallen off yet, so far so good. If the suction cup was as good as the mount I would have given it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Greg H

customer_reviews.title: Quick and Easy replacement
customer_reviews.text: Update: 5 stars dropped to 2. The suction to mount the camera loosens every now and then. I have to reattach it, but it's pretty unsafe because the mount gave way while I was driving. My dash cam smacked me in the face and I almost hit a car because of it. High heat areas, please avoid this particular product. This was pretty easy to use. I was able to quickly replace the mount for my dash cam. There are various attachments for you to try if you have no idea what you need to replace the mount.
customer_reviews.author: V. N.

customer_reviews.title: There are multiple fitting but it didnt really fit my dash camera so its loose
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because it had a bunch of fitting to slide in a variety of camera's none of them really fit mine but i made one work and i was able to mount it on my car. I needed to buy this about 3 weeks ago so i would have had a video of a Taxi who lost control in the freeway when it hit an icy patch at 70+ MPH and spun sideways only to regain traction on a dry patch cross 3 lanes and tbone my vehicle. After the accident i placed the order and received it with in a couple days and the camera is staying on the windshield
customer_reviews.author: Thomas H.

customer_reviews.title: So far so good, seems better than stock
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I’ve had it installed for a couple weeks and it seems to be holding up. My last units died in the AZ heat after a few weeks. The sun is less this time of year but we’ll find out if it makes it through a Phoenix summer.
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement set
customer_reviews.text: So the extreme heat here in Scottsdale, AZ destroyed the suction cup on my dashcam. Fortunately this kit has the parts necessary to adapt the mount to several different cam models. Had it back in operation in a few minutes. Pro tip: do not leave the mount on your windshield if you are in warm sunny places. UPDATE: I have had a couple of the suction mounts fall off the windshield and promptly break on the console. Unfortunately it breaks on the joint so the replacement set really doesn't help in this situation.
customer_reviews.author: ignorance is bliss

customer_reviews.title: Used for mounting outdoor Blink XT2 Camera on Glass Door/Windows
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this mount not for a car camera but to mount a Blink XT2 outdoor camera at the beach which is heavy with salt/corrosive air. I have used other suction mounts that had metal joints/balls that quickly corroded so I was looking for one that had essential parts of noncorrosive plastic and this was it ... more expensive that ones provided by Blink/or associates but well worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Tom K.

customer_reviews.title: Replaces bad suction cup on Old Shark dash cam
customer_reviews.text: Suction cup much better than one one Old Shark cam
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best windshield mount I have used
customer_reviews.text: I have had several cheap dashcams mounted on the windshields of two different vehicles, so I have had experience with a number of mounts. I bought this one for a Shark dashcam to replace the one that came with the cam. It works well. The lever to apply the suction works better than the screw method that came with the Shark mount. The mechanism to loosen and tighten the positioning of the cam with this mount works very well, allowing for precise positioning.
customer_reviews.author: Jon A. Spaller

customer_reviews.title: Would not stick
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what the problem is with this suction mount, but it could NOT stick anywhere on my dashboard. I peeled off the plastic film on the bottom of the clear cup, locked the clamp, and...no suction at all. Just didn't work at all.
customer_reviews.author: ToddDominey

customer_reviews.title: Great for window mounting.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a normal suction cup mount that was compact for talking time lapses and video from windows. I paired this with a Ulanzi tripod mount for the perfect solution. I had previously purchased a different suction mount which had sticky tape on the suction cup. That'd be fine for a textured dash board, but not a window. This one was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jim H

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: It was EXACTLY what I needed. The extra parts give me some options too. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: DJ Cue

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use; stays on a long time
customer_reviews.text: Simply put, this suction cup works better than I expected. I wasn't sure what to do with al the accessories included, but did find the one I needed and put the device on my windshield. It's been there almost two weeks and I detect no sign that it is loosening. I have not tried more demanding applications like putting on the exterior of the car.
customer_reviews.author: Robert W.

customer_reviews.title: Not very customizable
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to replace my original dash-cam holder, which broke after a year of use. This holder is about of the same quality with weak latch mechanism. It does not secure the camera well enough.
customer_reviews.author: jason

customer_reviews.title: Super suction, amazing product
customer_reviews.text: I am using this item for my Mobius dash camera. The suction is incredibly good!!! The Mobius is very lightweight though so I can't say how heavier objects would do, but I have tried janking it off the window without using the release and it will just hold. A solid buy!!
customer_reviews.author: D. C.

customer_reviews.title: Numerous adapters make it easy.
customer_reviews.text: Works wonderful with our dash cam. The numerous adapters make it easy to fit any camera.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great mount for the price
customer_reviews.text: I never could get it tight enough to completely keep the ball from moving. I think the higher quality mounts use a rubber coated ball that you can completely lock down but I didn't have any problems with the weight of the camera moving it so it functioned well enough.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew J. Nauta

customer_reviews.title: My other mount from a cheap 4K camera broke (both of them!).
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I bought a cheap 4K camera with a lot of holding attachments. The camera was well made, but the attachments were not the greatest. I bought this kit and have no complaints, even if something went wrong, it wouldn't bother me to buy another kit!
customer_reviews.author: Joe Paletta

customer_reviews.title: Better than original.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace the original for my dash cam that became brittle and broke when it fell. This one feels far superior to the original, and incredible suction. Lots of miscellaneous attachments included too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It failed me.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace the original for my Falcon Zero 170 dashcam. It didn't really fit. Had to use the old mount's head with this one's body. Disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: KP ESQ.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to adapt to cameras
customer_reviews.text: The camera mount has a variety of adapters for just about any camera and the they are excellent quality. No chinsing out. It also stuck on my windshield no problem. There is special gearing that allows for more adjustment. I prefer it over the original by far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable suction mount with a variety of camera adapters.
customer_reviews.text: We use this mount for our YI Dash Cam. It also came with a variety of adapters that can be used with other cameras. It was well packaged. The suction mount holds well and can be removed or repositioned easily. The mount seems durable. We prefer it to the mount that came with the camera. (The original used 3M tape to secure it to the dash.)
customer_reviews.author: jsstephens

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these. The first one melted just from summer heat so I ordered a second one and this second one would fall off once a week till now, now it falls off every 3 minutes when driving despite thoroughly cleaning the windshield and the suction mount. Thankfully didn't get pulled over for having my dashcam swinging around till I just removed it entirely and now I need a new mount. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Pearce

customer_reviews.title: Works very well with a little adjustment.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Nexar dashcam. The smallest size only needed a tiny amount of trimming to make it fit the dashcam. Once that was done, it worked perfectly. The suction cup works very well, and is far better than the stick on supplied by Nexar. Very satisfied with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Purrcy

customer_reviews.title: Very Impressed
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with the iSportgo S30 dash mount! The product is sturdy and well made and versatile. Fit easy with my older modle dash cam, which wasn’t expensive nor a name brand. Your mount was better made than the original mount that came with the car cam!
customer_reviews.author: Lark1

customer_reviews.title: many different options happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: very well made , many different options happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.author: FXR-TED

customer_reviews.title: Held my Go Pro in pace on the race track
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my street car to use on track night. I normally use a roll bar mount in my race car. The suction cup held firmly in place on the windshield for the entire event. Popped off easily when I was done. Cheap enough so that if this is the only time I use it it will still be worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Mike L Strawbridge

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT DO NOT DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Cracked and fell of my windshield and gouged the dashboard of my brand new truck. Horrible product. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too many to use.
customer_reviews.text: I will never use all these gadgets due to the sheer amount of them that come in the package. But that's ok. They work great with my action camera and fit all GoPro cameras and look-alikes.
customer_reviews.author: Verified/Frequent Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product with excellent price!
customer_reviews.text: It was an excellent product. The price is excellent too! You can' buy this in any store with the excellent quality and the price. It is highly recommendable.
customer_reviews.author: Dimas Reyes

customer_reviews.title: No brainer at this price point
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to hold mic's but it's reasonably strong for it's size. On glass it's got plenty of suction to hold a phone or gopro. I have a separate stronger mount for holding cameras outside the car
customer_reviews.author: Pooft Lee

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Suction cup for onboard camera for my car became too old and it had no suction left - got stiff and expanded from being exposed to the sun all the time. This mount came with all sorts of adapters and one of them was perfect match with my camera. Thanks to this adapter, my camera is working again. As a matter of fact, I ordered another one as a spare.
customer_reviews.author: Yukio T.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!!
customer_reviews.text: worked perfectly with my Cobra windshield camera. The original that came with the Cobra quit sticking to the window. This has a larger cup and worked perfectly. The whole piece is sturdy and heavy duty. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: ArcadiaLdogg

customer_reviews.title: it holds
customer_reviews.text: i use this on my GO PRO... on my Sea Doo PWC
customer_reviews.author: JMK

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: The mount that came with my Old Shark camera was not good from the beginning and finally broke. This mount is a much better quality than the original. It actually sticks to the window and is taught. This is a great replacement.
customer_reviews.author: James Godeaux

customer_reviews.title: A year in and it still rocks
customer_reviews.text: I bought this over a year ago. It works great. I often reposition it with no problem. I tossed the extra pieces in a drawer and kind of forgot about them until I bought a new dashcam. I had the correct piece to mount it. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: K. Ellingson

customer_reviews.title: Holds to the window better that the old mount but adapters need to be modified
customer_reviews.text: This windshield mount is superior to my AmCam mount. However, the adapters were too large. I had to do some backyard engineering to get it to work. So if you can modify things then this product will work for you.
customer_reviews.author: HC

customer_reviews.title: Fit the unit first try.
customer_reviews.text: The delivery was badly delayed given it was Prime. I don't know if it was the vendor or the shipping company, so I'll take it in stride. The product itself works well and had I the need (and was not in a rush), I would order it again. I didn't even have to play around with the adapters. It fit my unit perfectly first try.
customer_reviews.author: JohnWarren

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: great deal, great price, fits like the real mount. I ordered this to replace my mount for my dashcam and this worked out to be a perfect fit,,,,excellent price and was delivered on time.... i would order from this company again...thanks
customer_reviews.author: Papasim

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Brought this product to replace the sunction mount that came with my dash cam. It was easy to change the adapter to fit my dashcam.
customer_reviews.author: amygar99

customer_reviews.title: Fits Ivation Dash Cam
customer_reviews.text: Using with Ivation Dash Cam. Of course the Dash Cam doesn’t come with it. Perfect fit and well made. Should last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Steve C

customer_reviews.title: Dont put anything expensive on it
customer_reviews.text: The suction power is horrible, i put it on my windshield and it will fall off sometimes a few seconds later sometimes a couple hours. Has happened alot while driving.
customer_reviews.author: Chef Lexx

customer_reviews.title: Good suction cup
customer_reviews.text: Universal fit suction cup kit. It did not quite fit my dash cam ( ThiEYE Safeel One ) But I just added a dab of caulk to mount and it stays in place. Great kit for universal fit for the money. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Dawson

customer_reviews.title: Great solution for quickly mounting and removing dashcams
customer_reviews.text: Works great, much better than using messy stick-on adhesive. Very secure, hasn’t fallen off yet. Only thing is it would be great if the suction cup was black instead of clear so it would be much less noticeable in windshield.
customer_reviews.author: techie

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: It definitely holds on strong to the glass, if you need something to hold your action camera, this will definitely do the job. It will not work on the car dash board though, just a heads up, but once again, it is for glass and not the dashboard.....im still happy with the purchase.....
customer_reviews.author: Mars

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Use this to hold a Bluetooth speaker on my kayak. Works great
customer_reviews.author: Jean-mich Pilot

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Meets/exceeded my needs... I used this for my go pro while driving around... it is very strong. I left it in the car in the boiling Florida sun for days... no problem. Came right off when I tried to remove it again.
customer_reviews.author: Kevaughn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I was looking for! I recently got my windshield replaced and silly me when I went to take my dash cam off, the suction cup broke and I needed a new one. This was perfect for what I needed. It came with attachments that I didn't need but I may in the future, who knows. The suction works great! Been on there a few days and it's still going strong. Doesn't move the cam around when I drive. Good quality and easy to install, definitely recommend if you need a replacement suction cup.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good but not fit for me
customer_reviews.text: the product is good, lots of different joints, but my car record is too small, not fit for me. so I return it. not product has something wrong, just not fit.
customer_reviews.author: Ming

customer_reviews.title: very happy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this suction cup mount cause I was looking to do some amateur iPhone filming and need something to be able to put in various locations. This mount was great, and it came with a variety of mounts for different types of cameras as well. It could easily be used for other things as well, like if you need a dash mount for your phone or maybe your go pro for filming. Honestly good and affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Tons of adapters,
customer_reviews.text: It works for my camera, I had tried another that you mount to a mirror and it was a pain. Especially since I want to move from vehicle to vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: David B

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Dash Cam Mount At A Good Price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the iSportgo S30 to mount my Akaso V1 dash cam. After trying several other mounts I found this one to perform the best, while maintaining an unobstructed view and low profile. Even though it fell one time I would still recommend and purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: F Sandoval

customer_reviews.title: I was apprehensive about buying this because it didn't list ...
customer_reviews.text: I was apprehensive about buying this because it didn't list my dash cam as compatible, but I decided to try it anyway with the idea that I could somehow adapt it and make it work. To my surprise, not only did the iSportgo S360 arrived promptly, it fit perfectly and the suction cup is clearly holding on to the windshield stronger than the original. I ordered a 2nd one so that I would have it handy in case something happened to the one I just bought.
customer_reviews.author: Larry L. Hassenpflug

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I needed to replace my dash camera mount due to it loosing its suction and I came across this mount. So far, I really like it. It feels sturdy and seems like it will hold up well. My only wish was that it had the same swivel attachment as my old mount did, so the camera sat further down and away from the mount itself. I did try using the old attachment but the ballbearing is larger on this new one so it was not compatible.
customer_reviews.author: Dale

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It worked perfectly in replacement of the original mounting apparatus.
customer_reviews.author: Maddie

customer_reviews.title: Versatile but didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: Prompt delivery, contained all the parts, however dif not have the piece for my situation. The YI Nightscape Dash Cam, 1080p Smart Wi-Fi Car Camera with Heat-Resistant Supercapacitor, Superb Night Vision, Sony Sensor, 140° FOV, 2.4”Screen, Phone App - Black
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Go for it
customer_reviews.text: Totally happy with this ! Fits my needs, really not expensive (I just hate to use word "cheap" - was in wine and liquor sales for too long , always told my sales guys - never use "cheap" It's like asking what kind of suite you wearing. Oh, it's cheap. Wrong ! You were just lucky to find a great product for a little less money ! ), easy to handle. No more words, as I said - satisfied 100 %
customer_reviews.author: Yuri Dudin

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this so I am able to mount my Yi action camera to my windshield in my car and it works awesome. It is all plastic besides the tripod screw but everything works and doesn't feel like it's going to break.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Pitman

customer_reviews.title: Suction mount
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the mount to replace a broken mount for my back up (second/not main) dash cam. It arrived in a timely manner and one of the many attachments fit my camera. It was easy to switch out attachments, but since I have not needed my back up camera (I haven't used a rental car, etc.) I don't know how the suction works. More when I have used my back up camera.
customer_reviews.author: Anna S.

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement
customer_reviews.text: The one that came with my dash cam broke. This was better than the one that came with. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mary E.

customer_reviews.title: Lots of adjustments
customer_reviews.text: Used it to replace an old shark mount that had broken loose from the suction cup. Easily fount the correct attachment and mounted to the windshield. Seems very sturdy. It was a little longer than the original mount, but it was so adjustable that I was able to get it hid behind the rearview mirror with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: gabriel watts

customer_reviews.title: Won't mount on dash
customer_reviews.text: Great for my camera as I'm driving, wish it would mount on my dash instead of window luckily my camera has a invert option.
customer_reviews.author: Lamont Lane

customer_reviews.title: great stand
customer_reviews.text: I have had other stands for my auto camera and this is the only one that works the way it is supposed to work. It was easy to set up and was ready with a couple of minutes. It was a good buy and I am delighted with it.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Sarellano`

customer_reviews.title: Multiple fittings and fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: This came with multiple fittings and had the correct one for my pilot dash cam. It is doing a fine job, delivery was quick and I'm completely happy with this purchase so yes I would recommend if you need one.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen F.

customer_reviews.title: Another worthless suction mount.
customer_reviews.text: Suction lasted about 3 months. Was installed in clean glass following instructions. Seems that it is difficult finding a good suction mount. Fell off several times during the 3 months. No better than the rest.
customer_reviews.author: J. Wentz

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money, and holds fast!
customer_reviews.text: The suction mount is every bit as good as the higher-priced names. It’s solid, easy to use and really holds fast. The cup material itself is sticky to the touch, which helps maintain the seal, as long as your surface is clean. Really can’t ask for any more.
customer_reviews.author: Roger H. Wilco

customer_reviews.title: dash cam replacement suction cup assemble
customer_reviews.text: Worked great on my pilot dash cam which had a broken suction cup. Looks great and works great. Very happy with this replacement!
customer_reviews.author: drewman

customer_reviews.title: Great fit. Universal mount dash camera.
customer_reviews.text: Great mount replacement. I had a different dash camera and it fits great.
customer_reviews.author: Francisco

customer_reviews.title: Good Little Mount
customer_reviews.text: I was a little concerned it would be big and bulky based on another review. It wasn’t. Worked well with my iphone standard iPhone attachment.
customer_reviews.author: RikRok

customer_reviews.title: Works better than other brand
customer_reviews.text: Works exactly as I expected. Easy installation. The ball joint is a very good design. You can almost adjust the camera at any angle.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvester

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to replace the original one that came with my camera.
customer_reviews.author: LJS

customer_reviews.title: Loses grip when hot
customer_reviews.text: Would give it 5 stars but when the suction gets hot it loses grip
customer_reviews.author: Janice Barnett

customer_reviews.title: Works as intended
customer_reviews.text: I actually used parts off of this to repair my current suction mount.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super
customer_reviews.text: I could not find suitable connector to my Front car cam, so it is very nice device, I'm very excited to buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Yana

customer_reviews.title: Work great.
customer_reviews.text: Strong and sturdy. Has held my dash cam for 2 months now.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Its legit
customer_reviews.text: The suction was very good and the mounting was easy to install. The iSportgo S30 comes with 10 different joints to mount, which makes it nice if you were to upgrade your dashcam. However, you may (or may not) have to unscrew the default piece that comes standard on the S30 to install the specific joint that you require for your type of dashcam.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Resolved the issue of the suction cup not holding my dash cam. Been on the windshield for over a month now with no letting go. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Retired Computer Tech

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Used to mount lights on my boat for night fishing. Works great and easy to move.
customer_reviews.author: patrick

customer_reviews.title: Wish I would have bought two!
customer_reviews.text: You can't beat it! I use it for my GoPro, my dash cam, and my phone! It has the perfect degree of movent to get that desired angle!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: be aware of  power cord length could be short for some installs
customer_reviews.text: Happy with quick delivery, install was easy, fit my dash cam. Only down side was cable was too short to fit behind trim and extend to power outlet on dash ( 2016 ford transit van mid roof). was able to rewire a power outlet on ceiling package tray.
customer_reviews.author: leslie h bourne

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: So far I like everything about the suction mount, especially its flexibility to apply to multiple styled cameras.
customer_reviews.author: George of Texas

customer_reviews.title: Worked!!
customer_reviews.text: I was able to swap out the broken part on my “generic” dash cam with one from this kit and mount back onto dash.
customer_reviews.author: Jwkinsey

customer_reviews.title: This ended up being much smaller than I anticipated. ...
customer_reviews.text: This ended up being much smaller than I anticipated. It definitely would not support the camera I had planned on mounting with this device (Ring Wireless Battery operated). It is so small that I haven't found a practical use for it yet but I just haven't had the time to send it back.
customer_reviews.author: AH64DUDE

customer_reviews.title: Different amounts for different application of dash cam
customer_reviews.text: I had a dash cam with no mount , the mounting system came with different parts to mount the camera I found the one that fit the sleeve of my dash cam. It works great it's better than the original Mount that came with it. I recommend this product to anyone who has a dash cam.
customer_reviews.author: The Pashn 79

customer_reviews.title: Well-made, fits just about any model
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised at how well-made this mount is. It works better than the original that came with the Falcon Zero!
customer_reviews.author: AP

customer_reviews.title: Suction? What Suction
customer_reviews.text: lt does not stay on my laptop. EVERY Zoom call it falls off at least once and I have at least six Zoom calls a week. Thank you for the followup email. I'll look into returning to Amazon. I bought this just for the suction mount. I have no need for other mounting options. Ron Holdaway 615-218-0602
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: The suction works great, and there were plenty of different mounts available. Unfortunately even though "crosstour" dash cam was on the list, it did not fit mine and no way to use old mount with new suction mount. I was however able to slightly modify new mount to make it fit so I'm good.
customer_reviews.author: Pedro Valentin

customer_reviews.title: Performance
customer_reviews.text: I am using this for the Z Edge z3. I like the suction cup that I received two. The second week I had it on the windshield, it fell off twice. The glass was cleaned prior. We will see how it performs against the original one. So far i do like it. Ed.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I was able to set up my webcam in a better spot because of the many different positions available with this mount
customer_reviews.author: Karen P

customer_reviews.title: Every attachment you need
customer_reviews.text: I was very surprised to see that they managed to fit about a dozen attachments inside the little box the suction cup came in. I was worried I'd still have to buy separate parts but you could get just about anything to work with this mount. Just be sure to dust the surface you want to put the mount on.
customer_reviews.author: Rollain

customer_reviews.title: Adjustability
customer_reviews.text: Like the adjustability/ suction tends to come loose if not wetted properly.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie Eckard

customer_reviews.title: good quality product
customer_reviews.text: THIS I USE FOR REAR VIEW CAMERA. 100 DEGREES HOT OUTSIDE, BUT IT IS HOLDING DASHCAM. SO FAR I LIKE IT.
customer_reviews.author: TIMOSHKA@54

customer_reviews.title: Works well so far.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to find the correct piece for my dash cam. Had a bit of trouble getting it to suction correctly, then used a bit of moisture and it has been on for over two weeks. Sets a bit away from windshield glass but does not seem to affect camera visual.
customer_reviews.author: Kirk Ryan McKay

customer_reviews.title: Nice replacement dash cam mount
customer_reviews.text: More sturdy than the mount that came with my dash cam. Comes with a variety of "ball joints" for connecting to most dash cams. Saved my camera.
customer_reviews.author: Bill L

customer_reviews.title: Nice mount
customer_reviews.text: As described. I’m using it with a Akasho camera. Mount to camera is very secure and suction works great on windshield or sun roof. Have not tried it on painted surface. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Mike Cothren

customer_reviews.title: dash cam mount
customer_reviews.text: Arrived as specified. Lots of different mounts and easy to stick to the windshield. great product.
customer_reviews.author: Owen R. Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Looks like it will be better than the original mount for my dash cam.
customer_reviews.text: My last dash cam mount broke..this product fit my cam and seems to be better built than the original mount.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Good Product.  Good for the money.  Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Good for the money. Easy to install. Love it. Work great.
customer_reviews.author: Noy Mikavan

product_meta.title: iSportgo S30 Dash Cam Suction Mount with 10pcs Joints for REXING,Z-Edge,Old Shark,YI,KDLINKS,Falcon Zero,Transcend,Crosstour,VANTRUE,GoPro Hero and Most Other Dash Cameras DVR GPS
product_meta.description:
iSportgo Dash Cam Suction Mount S30 

Brand : iSportgo 
Model No.:S30 
Material: POM+ABS+PVC+Screw 
Size:φ5.5*H7.5cm 
Mount Net weight: 75g 
Package weight: 145g 
Bearing weight: ≤ 5 kgs(11 Ib) 
Tolerable Temperature Range:-20℃～70℃ 

What's in the box 
1pcs Suction mount 
10pcs Different Joints 
1pcs Feedback card 
1pcs Warranty Card 

Widely Applicable models: (For the corresponding brand and model, please check the picture) 
REXING,Z-Edge,Old Shark,YI,KDLINKS,Falcon Zero,Transcend,Crosstour, VANTRUE, GoPro Hero 

Aketek,Effort,zhiroad,Trochilus,Lecmal,SMALL-EYE, Amebay,Actionpie,AUKEY,TaoTronics,HP,Ausdom,DOD Tech 
Crosstour, WheelWitness,Spy Tec,Toguard,G1W,Black Box,G1W-B,G1W-C,G1W-CB,G1W-X,G1W-H...LS300W, LS400W.......

iSportgo is a good brand in outdoor sport product accessories and Car accessories field. 
We've worked across R&D and sales in outdoor field for many years, we are committed to providing the highest quality products and service, we’re just happy that you’re happy. 

Warranty&Customer service: 
You can feel confident using our iSportgo brand product 
24-Hour friendly customer support 
30-Day no reason for refund guarantee 
12-Month warranty for replacement 
2-Year warranty for quality-related issues 

We hope you never have such need,but if you do,our friendly and hassles-free service will work hard to put a smile back on your face.
feature_bullets: ★★★NOTICE: iSportgo brand mount ONLY sold by "Leaderway USA" Store,and Fulfilled by Amazon ★S30 with 10pcs different joints, suitable for most popular brand dash cam, such as REXING,Z-Edge,Old Shark,YI,KDLINKS,Falcon Zero,Transcend,Crosstour,VANTRUE,Black Box,GoPro Hero......For the corresponding brand and model, please check the picture
The mount uses POM and ABS plastics ,tolerable temperature range is :-40℃～120℃;the suction cup uses PVC material, tolerable temperature range is :-20℃～70℃,and bearing weight up to 5kgs(11 lb)
Easy to Install,Remove the suction cup protective film and attach to a Clean and smooth surface to get Maximum holding strength on the Windshield.
360 degree rotation design,rotate ball adapter head provides flexibility for positioning the dash cam.
Easier to use than 3M Double-Sided Adhesive Mount Holder Bracket, no harm to car glass
